description: A complete redesign of the site to match the new MBTA Wiki mobile app on the Apple App Store. Changes include better graphics, colors, fonts, more line information, more station information, parking into and graph, and more! This is the biggest update to MBTA Wiki since the initial release.

Redesigned line pages, updated menus for site navigation, new interface for lines with multiple routes, updated Commuter Rail line titles, added bus stop pages, updated ferry routes, updated maps, removed unused file, added custom icons.
Updated station pages, bus route pages, contact form. Fixed typos.
Made Silver Line bus routes act the same as other routes, fixed 404 pages, redesigned sources page, removed some unused files.
Updated bus route pages, bus menu. Added bus alerts, bus route fare prices, and updated bus routes using the API.
Updated GLX Menu page, creating a divided menu and branch labels
Updated former and planned station pages and added South Coast Rail information in Planned Stations.
Rewritten station.js to be more efficient and take advantage of ES8 capabilities, added line alerts on line pages for subway, Silver Line, and Commuter Rail.
Changed Yawkey Station to Lansdowne Station.

Styles changed to lighter theme, station information loaded from CSV file and new API, button click-able area fixed, station predictions, station page aesthetic changes, more accurate line colors, more facilities information, Commuter Rail and Ferry Updated Station Pages, new Commuter Rail Timetables, with interactive options, removal of unused files.
Added bus route pages
Added information for the Foxboro Line on the Commuter Rail and added Blue Hill Ave station to the planned stations
Fixed problems with JFK/UMass and Shawmut stations on the Red Line
Added images for every subway station
Added former and planned stations
Added maps page (under More)
Added George's Island stop to the Hingham/Hull Ferry
Added timetables for Commuter Rail lines.
Updated information about SL3 on the South Station page.
Fixed typos, added SL3, added news
Added information and contact form
Added HTTPS for more secure browsing
Created MBTA Wiki with station information about all subway stations.
